trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 공유 연결 버전을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> 런타임에서 사용 되는 서비스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: 이 컨텍스트에서 공유 연결은 서비스가 추적 및 지 속성 서비스에 대 한 동일한 SQL 연결을 사용을 의미 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService 서비스는 서로 다른 개체 간에 공유 연결을 사용 하는 데이터베이스 트랜잭션에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대신 SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>에 프로그램 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>인스턴스를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the SQL server used by the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 하 여 SQL 클러스터 장애 조치 나 일시적인 네트워크 문제는 SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService 됩니다는 커밋 프로세스가 최대 20 회 다시 시도 발생 시키기 전에 다운 되는 SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService에서 사용 하는 SQL server는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 생성자는 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 서비스 응용 프로그램 구성 파일에서 로드할 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: 유효한 키가 `EnableRetries`합니다.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: 에 요청 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> 데이터베이스 연결이 실패할된 경우 다시 시도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> 클래스 데이터베이스 연결 문자열을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스 연결 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 여부는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> 작업 일괄 처리 커밋을 다시 시도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: 일괄 처리에 대 한 커밋 작업의 다시 시도 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>활동을 워크플로에 모델링 해야 합니다 (일반적으로 시간이 사용 하 여 외부 루프 및 예외 처리기는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>다시 시도할 수 없습니다이 예제의 고 있기 때문에 시작 되지 않았습니다 (소유 하지 않으므로) 트랜잭션이.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 설정 되 고 외에도 구성 파일을 통해이 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일을 통해이 속성을 설정 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [워크플로 구성 파일](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: 작업 일괄 처리 트랜잭션을 다시 시도에 대 한 일반적인 정보를 참조 하십시오. [일괄 처리 상태 정보를 워크플로](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>서비스는;에서 작업 일괄 처리 커밋을 다시 시도해 야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임에서 발생 하는 경우 호출 된 메서드가 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스를 시작 하기 위해 호출 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다.
